projects.title: Multi-Class Segmentation of Flood Imagery
projects.bodyText:
- 🛰️ Performs multi-class **semantic segmentation** on flood imagery using deep learning.
 - 🌊 Detects and classifies features like **flooded areas, roads, buildings, and vegetation**.
 - 📊 Built with Tensorflow, leveraging the **SegFormer** model and custom training pipelines for high-accuracy pixel-wise predictions.

projects.title: Traffic Sign Classification
projects.bodyText:
- 🚦 Built a deep learning model to classify traffic signs using the GTSRB dataset. 
 - 🧠 Utilized Tensorflow with a CNN architecture to recognize and categorize over 40 traffic sign classes. 
 - 📊 Includes data preprocessing, training, evaluation, and visualization of model performance.

projects.title: Sports Image Classification
projects.bodyText:
- 🏅 Image classification of sports types using **deep learning with Tensorflow**. 
 - 🧠 **Fine tuned** a pre-trained model to classify images into categories like football, basketball, tennis, etc. 
 - 📈 Pipeline includes **data loading, augmentation, model training, and performance evaluation**.

projects.title: Document Scanner using OpenCV in C++
projects.bodyText:
- 📄 Developed a document scanner in C++ using OpenCV that **detects and extracts documents** from an image. 
 - 🧠 Applies **image processing techniques** like morphological operations, contour detection, and homography. 
 - 🔍 Outputs a flattened, top-down view of the document, simulating a real scanned copy.
